TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UIPropertyMetadata extends System.Windows.PropertyMetadata

summary.span: 为在核心级别具有呈现/用户界面影响的非框架属性提供属性元数据。

span.span: Provides property metadata for non-framework properties that do have rendering/user interface impact at the core level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks (派生自此类) 是更常见的元数据类, 用于还具有呈现/用户界面影响的框架级属性。 (derived from this class) is the more common metadata class used for framework-level properties that also have rendering/user interface impact.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.name: isAnimationProhibited
param.span: 设置为 以防止属性系统对该元数据应用到的属性进行动画处理。

span.span: Set to to prevent the property system from animating the property that this metadata is applied to.

param.span: 如果尝试对此类属性进行动画处理，它们将引发运行时异常。

span.span: Such properties will raise run time exceptions if animations of them are attempted.
The default is .

summary.span: 用指定的默认值和回调以及用于在属性上禁用动画的布尔值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, with the specified default value and callbacks, and a Boolean used to disable animations on the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsAnimationProhibited { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsAnimationProhibited : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，声明是否应在应用了包含元数据实例的依赖项对象上禁用动画。

span.span: Gets or sets a value declaring whether animations should be disabled on the dependency property where the containing metadata instance is applied.

value.span: 指示不允许动画； 指示允许动画。

span.span: indicates that animations are disallowed; indicates that animations are allowed.
The default is (animations allowed).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 可以对[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]框架实现[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]中可用的默认依赖属性进行动画处理。In general, the default dependency properties available in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] framework implementation [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] can be animated. 您可以在自己的自`true`定义依赖项属性的元数据中将此属性设置为, 以在其上禁用动画。You might set this property to `true` in the metadata of your own custom dependency property to disable animations on it. 如果具有此值`true`的属性尝试用作动画目标, 则会引发运行时异常。If a property with this value `true` attempts to be used as an animation target, a runtime exception will be raised. 的任何派生类的属性通常在对象模型中定义为可读写。Properties on any derived classes of are normally defined in the object model as read-write. 这样就可以在实例初始化后进行调整。This is so they can be adjusted after initialization of the instance. 但是, 在调用、 或的过程中使用元数据后, 属性系统将会密封元数据实例, 传达元数据的细节的任何属性现在被视为不可变。However, once the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and any properties that convey the specifics of the metadata are now considered immutable. 如果尝试设置一次`true` , 此元数据实例将引发异常。Attempting to set once is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception.
